form.name: Shim Jun Poome-Sae
form.meaning: Begin Planting Seeds for the Future
form.interpretation: A new role of loyalty through physical and mental training
form.readyPosition: Left half command stance (Left fist high, right at side) in parallel stance
newBlocks: Square Block with Knifehand And Fist [34,55]
Double Blocks with Knifehand And Fist [54,74]
newTechniques: Single-arm blocks and strikes [2-4,9,13,18-20,25,30,36,38-41,43-46,48-50,57,59-62,65,66,68-70,77,80] (Opposite arm remains at side)
All strikes and single blocks in Shim Jun are Single Action unless otherwise noted as Double Action
All open hand techniques start closed and end open. Exceptions: #35, #43, #46, #56, #66
All Round Kicks are performed with the ball of the foot
Form should take about 2:05 to 2:10 minutes from attention to final bow
steps: Left foot steps to middle stance on northeast line; Left Double Inner Forearm Block to southeast high section

Land in middle stance facing north (left foot on west point), eyes to east, Right Low Block to east
No step, Right Circular Inner Forearm Block to east high section
No step, Right Punch to east mid-section
Left foot steps to closed stance, Right #3 Side Kick to east knee level, slow (2 seconds) And...
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick (ball of the foot) to mid-section. And...
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick (ball of the foot) to mid or high section
Land in right sparring stance to east, Right Double Outer Forearm Low Block (right open/left closed) right foot on center point
Left foot steps forward 1 sparring stance length, Right #2 Jump Side Kick to east mid or high section
Land in left back stance, Right Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block to east high section. Left foot lands where it took off from for jump kick
No step, Left Reverse Punch to east mid-section
No step, Right Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block to east
Right foot steps back 180 degrees counterclockwise to right back stance (right foot on center point), Left Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block to east high section
No step, Right Reverse Punch to east mid-section
No step, Left Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block to east
Bah-ro - Left foot steps back to end position.
Shi-uh - At ease position (about face, fix uniform, return to set position)

segments.technique: L Circular Double Knifehand Low Block
R Circular Double Knifehand Low Block
R Square Block (L closed, R open)
R Upset Knifehand Strike (Do not close hand)
R Low Inward Inner Forearm Block
Knifehand High X-Block (L closest to head)
L Knifehand Strike (Do not close hand)
L Double Outer Forearm Low Block (L open, R closed)
L Square Block (R closed, L open)
L Upset Knifehand Strike (Do not close hand)
L Low Inward Inner Forearm Block
R Horizontal Back Elbow Strike KI-HAP
L Knifehand High/Low Block (close to open)
R Knifehand High/Low Block (close to open)
R Double Outer Forearm Low Block (R open, L closed)
R Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block
R Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block
L Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block
L Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block

form.name: Jung Yul Poome-Sae
form.meaning: With your noble character, you will develop a new permanence in your life
form.readyPosition: Right half command stance (Right fist high, left at side) in parallel stance
newBlocks: Side High Knifehand/Low Open Hand Block [17,62]
newStrikes: Horizontal Elbow Strike, Vertical Back Elbow [1,3]
newKicks: Jump Reverse Inner Crescent Kick (Butterfly Kick) [43]
newStances: One Leg Stance (foot shields knee, but does not touch) [15-17,60-62]
steps: Right foot steps right to middle stance facing east (left foot on center point); Left Horizontal Elbow (palm down), Right Vertical Back Elbow to east mid & high section
No step, Left Square Block to north high section with tension (5 seconds)
Double step to left side to middle stance facing east (right foot on center point); Right Horizontal Elbow (palm down), Left Vertical Back Elbow to east mid & high section
No step, Right Square Block to south high section with tension (5 seconds)
Move left foot to right in closed stance (both feet on center point), Twin Punch to east high section with tension (5 seconds) hands end 1 fist length from forehead
Step 1 Sparring stance length east to right X-stance, Right Punch to east high section (body position at 45° to northeast)
No step, Right Downward Elbow Strike (raise hand slightly before strike) to east mid-section
No step, Right Circular Double Knifehand Low Block to east
Left foot steps back to right front stance, Left Reverse Circular Hooking Block (palm facing forward & down) to east high section
No step, Right Circular Hooking Block (palm facing forward & down) to east high section.
No step, Left Reverse Vertical Punch to east high section
Left #2 Outer Axe Kick to east mid or high section
Land in left front stance, Left Knifehand Low Block to east
No step, Right Reverse Circular Outer Knifehand Block to east high section.
Left foot moves south 1 shoulder width; right foot moves to shield left knee in left one-legged stance to east (left foot on east point), Left Arc Hand Strike to east high section.
No step, Right Reverse Upward Elbow to left palm, east high section.
No step, Left High Knifehand/Right Low Open Hand Block (palm faces back) to sides slow (2 seconds) (eyes to south)
Right foot steps south 1 sparring stance length, left foot steps behind to right X-stance; Right Reinforced Inner Forearm Block to south high section (hips and shoulders face south)
No Step, Right Back Fist to south high section (shoulders remain facing south)
No Step, Right Horizontal Hammerfist Strike to south high section (shoulders remain facing south)
Left foot steps back to left back stance (left foot on east point), Right Circular Double Knifehand Block to south high section
Left #2 Inner Crescent Kick to south mid or high section. (Step down to right foot in closed stance to north) KI-HAP
In a continuous motion, Right Reverse Hook Kick to south mid or high section.
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick to south mid or high section
Land in left back stance, Right High Block to south high section
Right foot pulls back to left rear stance, Right Downward Palm Block to south low section
Right foot steps south to middle stance (right foot on southeast point), Right Punch to south high section
Left foot steps west 90 degrees counterclockwise to left back stance to east; Right Inward Palm Block to mid-section. (end with knuckles pointing up, elbow bent)
No step, Left Reverse Punch to east high section
No step, Right Upset Knifehand Strike to east high section
Right foot steps behind left to left X-stance, Right Circular Downward Knifehand Strike to east high section. (collarbone level)
Right Front Kick to east mid or high section
Replace right foot back to left X-stance, left foot steps west one middle stance length (left foot on south point), in a continuous motion, Right #1 Side Kick to east mid or high section
Land in middle stance, Right Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block to east
Left foot shifts to right back stance, Left Circular Double Knifehand Block to west high section
Right #2 Round Kick (ball of the foot) to west mid or high section. And moving counterclockwise...
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick (ball of the foot) to south mid or high section.
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick (ball of the foot) to east mid or high section
Land in right sparring stance to north (left foot on south point), Right Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike to north. (left hand vertical at solar plexus, right fingertips even with shoulder)
Right foot pulls to left rear stance, Left High '9' Block to north, slow (2 seconds)

Jump 180 degrees counterclockwise to left sparring stance to north. Left Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike to north (right foot on south point). (right hand vertical at solar plexus, left fingertips even with shoulder)
Left foot pulls to right rear stance, Right High '9' Block to north, slow (2 seconds) KI-HAP

Right foot steps forward half a sparring stance length, Right Jump Reverse Inner Crescent Kick (Butterfly) to north mid or high section. (left foot lands where right foot took off from) right foot lands one middle stance length forward
Left Reverse Side Kick to north mid or high section. Left foot lands one sparring stance length to north.
In a continuous motion, Right #2 Side Kick to north mid or high section
Land in right sparring stance to north (right foot on north point), Right Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike to north (left hand vertical at solar plexus, right fingers even with shoulder)
Left #2 Round Kick (ball of the foot) to north mid or high section. And moving clockwise...
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick (ball of the foot) to east mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick (ball of the foot) to south mid or high section
Left foot lands to right in closed stance (both feet on north point), Twin Punch to west high section with tension (5 seconds) hands end 1 fist length from forehead
Step 1 sparring stance length west to left X-stance, Left Punch to west high section. (body position at 45° to northwest)
No step, Left Downward Elbow Strike (raise hand slightly before strike) to west mid-section.
No step, Left Circular Double Knifehand Low Block to west
Right foot steps back to left front stance, Right Reverse Circular Hooking Block (palm facing forward & down) to west high section
No Step, Left Circular Hooking Block (palm facing forward & down) to west high section
No Step, Right Reverse Vertical Punch to west high section
Right #2 Outer Axe Kick to west mid or high section
Land in right front stance, Right Knifehand Low Block to west
No Step, Left Reverse Circular Outer Knifehand Block to west high section
Right foot moves south 1 shoulder width; left foot moves to shield right knee in right one legged stance to west (right foot on northwest point), Right Arc Hand Strike to west high section
No step, Left Reverse Upward Elbow to right palm high section
No Step, Right High Knifehand/Left Low Open Hand Block (palm faces back) to sides, slow (2 seconds) (eyes to south) KI-HAP
Left foot steps south 1 sparring distance length, right foot steps behind to left X-stance; Left Reinforced Inner Forearm Block to south high section. (hips and shoulders face south)
No Step, Left Back Fist to south to high section. (shoulders remain facing south)
No Step, Left Horizontal Hammerfist Strike to south to high section. (shoulders remain facing south)
Right foot steps back to right back stance (right foot on northwest point), Left Circular Double Knifehand Block to south high section
Right #2 Inner Crescent Kick to south mid or high section. Step down to left foot in closed stance to north
In a continuous motion, Left Reverse Hook Kick to south mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick to south mid or high section
Land in right back stance, Left High Block to south
Left pulls to right rear stance, Left Downward Palm Block to south low section
Left steps south to middle stance (left foot on west point), Left Punch to south high section
Right foot steps east 90 degrees clockwise to right back stance to west (left foot on west point); Left Inward Palm Block to west mid-section (end with knuckles pointing up, elbow bent)
No step, Right Reverse Punch to west high section
No step, Left Upset Knifehand Strike to west high section
Left foot steps behind right to right X-stance, Left Circular Downward Knifehand Strike to west high section. (collarbone level)
Left Front Kick to west mid or high section
Replace left foot back to right X-stance, right foot steps east one middle stance length (right foot on center point), in a continuous motion, Left #1 Side Kick to west mid or high section
Land in middle stance, Left Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block to west
Right foot shifts to left back stance, Right Circular Double Knifehand Block to east high section
Jump spin 180 degrees counterclockwise, Left Knifehand Strike while in air to east high section
As you land in right back stance, Right Reverse Punch to east high section on landing. (left foot on center point)
Bah-ro - Right foot steps to end position
Shi-uh - At ease position (about face, fix uniform, return to set position)

segments.technique: L Horizontal Elbow; R-Vertical Back Elbow
R Horizontal Elbow; L-Vertical Back Elbow
R Circular Double Knifehand Low Block
R Reverse Circular Outer Knifehand Block
L High Knifehand/R-Low Open Hand Block (Slow)
R Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block
R Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike
L Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike
R Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike
L Circular Double Knifehand Low Block
L Reverse Circular Outer Knifehand Block
R High Knifehand/L-Low Open Hand Block (Slow) KI-HAP
L Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block

form.name: Chung San Poome-Sae
form.readyPosition: Left knifehand half command stance (Left knifehand high, right at side) in parallel stance
newStrikes: Twin Back Elbow Strikes to Sides [28]
steps: No step, Right Circular Upset Knifehand Block to east high section
No step, Left Long Fist Strike to east high section
Left Front Kick to east mid or high section (hold knee in re-chamber position)
Left Knifehand Strike to north mid-section
Left Side Kick to north mid or high section
In continuous motion, Left Side Kick to north mid or high section, slow (2 seconds)
Face east, step down to right foot, in double stepping motion, right foot steps to parallel stance, Left Circular Upset Knifehand Block to east high section
No step, Right Long Fist Strike to east high section
Right Front Kick to east mid or high section (hold knee in re-chamber position)
Right Knifehand Strike to south mid-section
Right Side Kick to south mid or high section
In continuous motion, Right Side Kick to south mid or high section, slow (2 seconds)
Right foot steps back to left front stance to east; Twin Vertical Palm Heel Strike to east mid-section. (left foot on center point)
Right foot pulls north to right back stance, Left Advanced Double Knifehand Block to east high section.
Left #1 Round Kick to east mid or high section (ball of the foot)
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick to east mid or high section. Lockout (2 seconds) with Instep
Step down to right foot, right foot steps back (west) in double stepping motion to right back stance, Left Circular Double Ridgehand Low Block to east
No step, Left Circular Double Knifehand Block to east high section

Jump 1 stance length west while turning 180 degrees' clockwise in air (lift knees high) land facing east in left back stance, Right Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block to east high section. (left foot on west point)
No step, Left Reverse Punch to east mid-section
No step, Right Punch to east mid-section
No step, Right Circular Inner Forearm Block to east high section
Right foot pulls to left rear stance, Right Advanced Double Ridgehand Block to east high section. KI-HAP
No step, Right Two Finger Strike to east high section (eyes), slow (2 seconds) and return to blocking position (right fingers stay in striking position); left hand stays in blocking position
Lift right leg to left one-leg stance; pivot 45 degrees to southeast diagonal while doing Right Downward Palm Block low section, slow (2 seconds)
Without stepping down, Left Jump Inner Crescent Kick to southeast mid or high section, striking right palm. Land in middle stance with left foot 2 middle stance lengths forward.
In a continuous motion, Left Jump Reverse Inner Crescent Kick to southwest mid or high section, striking right palm. (gain 4 feet on jump)
Landing in middle stance, Twin Horizontal Back Elbow Strike to sides, shoulder level. Fists are palm down. Eyes to southwest. (left foot on south point)
Right foot steps clockwise 45 degrees to right front/rear stance (front heel up) facing north, Right '9' Block (R-knifehand, L-fist) to north, slow (2 seconds)
Right #1 Front Kick to north mid or high section
Land in right front stance, Right Circular Ridgehand Block to north high section
No step, Left Reverse Two Finger Strike to north high section (eyes)
Right #3 Jump Front Kick to north mid or high section
Land in parallel stance, Right High/Low Inner Forearm Block to north (bottom hand palm up)
No step, Left High/Low Ridgehand Block to north
Right Outer Crescent Kick to north mid or high section
In a continuous motion, touching down behind left foot one back stance length, Right Spin Outer Crescent Kick to north mid or high section
Land in right back stance, Twin Outer Knifehand Block to north high section

Right foot steps north one sparring stance length, left foot steps behind to right X-stance; Left Upset Spearhand Strike to north high section; right hand pulls palm towards chest (hips and shoulders face north)
Left foot steps south to right back stance, Right Hammerfist Strike to north low section (groin)
No step, Right Reinforced Vertical Back Elbow Strike to north mid-section (left hand flat on right fist)
Left Reverse Hook Kick to north mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick (ball of the foot) to north mid or high section. KI-HAP
In a continuous motion, Left Side Kick to north mid or high section

Land in left sparring stance, Left Circular Downward Double Hammerfist Strike to north (Right hand vertical at solar plexus, left hand even with shoulder), slow (2 seconds) (left foot on center point)
Left foot pulls back to left half sparring stance, Left Downward Outer Forearm Block to north belt level
Left foot pulls to right foot to closed stance to northeast, Left Low Open Hand Sweeping Block to north
Left foot steps to left sparring stance, Left Backfist Strike to north high section with retraction
Skipping double step to left front/rear stance, Left '9' Block (L-knifehand, R-fist) to north, slow (2 seconds)
Left #1 Front Kick to north mid or high section
Land in left front stance, Left Circular Ridgehand Block to north high section
No step, Right Reverse Two Finger Strike to north high section (eyes)
Left #3 Jump Front Kick to north mid or high section
Land in parallel stance, Left High/Low Inner Forearm Block to north
No step, Right High/Low Ridgehand Block to north
Left Outer Crescent Kick to north mid or high section
In a continuous motion, touching down behind right foot one back stance length, Left Spin Outer Crescent Kick to north mid or high section
Land in left back stance, Twin Outer Knifehand Block to north high section

Left foot steps north one sparring stance length, right foot steps behind to left X-stance; Right Upset Spearhand Strike to north high section; left hand pulls palm towards chest. (hips and shoulders face north)
Right foot steps south to right back stance, Left Hammerfist Strike to north low section (groin)
No step, Left Reinforced Vertical Back Elbow Strike to north mid-section (right hand flat on left fist)
Right Reverse Hook Kick to north mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick (ball of the foot) to north mid or high section. KI-HAP
In a continuous motion, Right Side Kick to north mid or high section

Land in right sparring stance, Right Circular Downward Double Hammerfist Strike to north (Left hand vertical at solar plexus, right hand even with shoulder), slow (2 seconds) (right foot on north point)
Lift left leg to right one-leg stance; pivot 45 degrees to southeast diagonal while doing Left Downward Palm Block low section, slow (2 seconds)
Without stepping down, Right Jump Inner Crescent Kick to southeast mid or high section, striking left palm
Land in middle stance with right foot 2 middle stance lengths forward (see note at end of form). Twin Horizontal Hammerfist Strikes to both sides, shoulder level. Eyes to northeast
Left foot steps southeast 1 sparring stance length, Right Spin Heel Kick to southeast mid or high section
In a continuous motion, touch down 1 sparring stance length behind left foot, and immediately execute Right Jump Reverse Side Kick to southeast mid or high section traveling 1 foot forward…
Land in right sparring stance, Right Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block to southeast high section (right foot on east point)
Left foot steps west to form right front stance, Twin Vertical Palm Heel Strike to east mid-section
Left foot pulls south to left back stance, Right Advanced Double Knifehand Block to east high section
Right #1 Round Kick (ball of the foot) to east mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick to east mid or high section. Lockout (2 seconds) with Instep
Step down to left foot, left foot steps back (west) in double stepping motion to left back stance, Right Circular Double Ridgehand Low Block to east
No step, Right Circular Double Knifehand Block to east high section

Jump 1 stance length west while turning 180 degrees counter clockwise in air (lift knees high) land facing east in right back stance, Left Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block to east high section. (right foot on center point)
No step, Right Reverse Punch to east mid-section
No step, Left Punch to east mid-section
No step, Left Circular Inner Forearm Block to east high section
Left foot pulls to right rear stance, Left Advanced Double Ridgehand Block to east high section
No step, Left Two Finger Strike to east high section (eyes), slow (2 seconds) and return to blocking position (left fingers stay in striking position); right hand stays in blocking position.
Bah-ro - Left foot steps to end position.
Shi-uh - At ease position (about face, fix uniform, return to set position)

segments.technique: L Circular Double Ridgehand Low Block
R Advanced Double Outer Forearm Block
L Jump Reverse Inner Crescent Kick
R Reinforced Vertical Back Elbow Strike

form.name: Sok Bong Poome-Sae
form.interpretation: You will live comfortably and in peace
form.readyPosition: Right Knifehand ½ command stance: (right foot steps to parallel stance as arms are positioned)
newStrikes: Twin Palm Heel Push to Sides [67]
steps: Right foot steps east to right X-stance, ball of left foot should be 1 sparring stance length from center, Right Horizontal Double Knifehand Strike to east mid-section (body position at 45° to northeast)
Left Spin Heel Kick to east mid or high section, left foot lands on center point in sparring stance length
In continuous motion, bend at knees, right hand drops to floor, Left Sweep Kick (bottom of foot sweeps ankle level in motion like heel kick) to east (side of knee on floor)
Left Round Kick to southeast mid or high section
Left foot lands east to right knee stance (similar to back stance, but with rear knee on floor in line with front heel) Right Upset Knifehand Block to southeast high section
No step, Left Vertical Punch to southeast mid-section
No step, simultaneous Left Knifehand High Block, Right Upset Knifehand Strike to east high section
No step, Left Arc Hand Strike to east high section
No step, Right Reverse Upward Elbow Strike to left palm to east high section
Jump to middle stance (right foot replaces left foot), Right Double Outer Forearm Block to east high section

Left foot moves west to long stance (four foot lengths wide, rear leg pivoted to west and knee bent 90 degrees, front leg is extended), Right Downward Palm Heel Block (single action) with tension (5 seconds) to east as right leg straightens
Left foot steps to right, Right #1 Jump Side Kick to east mid or high section
In continuous motion, Pivot counterclockwise, left foot steps east to right back stance, C-Punch (mid & high section) to east (shoulders square to target)
Right foot shifts to form left front stance to east, Twin Upset Knifehand Strike to east, neck level.
Twin Outer Knifehand Block to east high section
Right foot pulls to shield left knee in left one-legged stance (left foot on east point), Twin Punch to east high section
Left Jump Front Kick to northeast mid or high section; right foot lands 1 sparring stance length southwest (on diagonal); left foot does not step down
No step, in place, Right Jump Front Kick to southeast mid or high section. Left foot lands in place; tight foot does not step down
Left Jump Front Kick to northwest mid or high section. Right foot lands in place, then left foot lands to the southwest to form left back stance towards northeast
No step, Right Double Knifehand Low Block with tension (5 seconds) to northeast
Pivot in place to right back stance, Left Double Knifehand Block with tension (5 seconds) to southwest high section
Right foot steps together to left foot, Right Jump Round Kick to southwest mid or high section, land 1 foot length to southwest in right sparring stance
In continuous motion, Left Spin Crescent Kick to southwest mid or high section
Land in left back stance, Right Double Outer Forearm Block to southwest, KI-HAP
No step, Left Reverse Upset First Knuckle Punch to southwest mid-section
Left foot steps to right, right foot steps forward to left back stance (right foot on south point), Left Reverse Horizontal First Finger Strike to southwest high section
Left #2 Inner Crescent Kick to southwest mid or high section, (prepare to land facing north)
Land in right rear stance to north, (right foot still on south point) Left Inward Palm Heel Block to north mid-section (end with knuckles pointing up, elbow bent)
No step, Right Reverse Punch to north mid-section
No step, Left Punch to north mid-section
No step, Right Reverse Punch to north high section
Left foot steps north to right back stance, Left Double Inner Forearm Block to north high section
No step, Right High/Low Block to north
No step, Left High/Low Palm Heel Block (palms travel center line) with tension (5 seconds) to north
Right #2 Front Kick to south low or mid-section. And…
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick, mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Right Hook Kick, mid or high section
Land in middle stance length to north. Left foot steps to right, Right #3 Hook Kick to north mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Right Round Kick to north mid or high section
Right foot lands on center point in left back stance, Right Upset Arc Hand Strike to north, neck level
Left foot steps to right closed stance to north, (both feet on center point), Left Circular Downward Hammerfist Strike to right palm, mid-section
Right foot steps clockwise west to right back stance to east (left foot on center point), Left Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike, slow (2 seconds) to east high section
Left #1 Side Kick east mid or high section

Retracting left leg, turn clockwise 180 degrees to land (body faces north), in long stance (four foot lengths wide; rear leg pivoted to east and knee bent 90 degrees, front leg is extended), Left Downward Palm Heel Block (single action) with tension (5 seconds) to west as left leg straightens. KI-HAP
Left foot shifts to left back stance, Knifehand X-Block to east, mid-section
Left foot steps behind right foot; left knee placed on floor taking place of right foot, both palms on floor, Right #1 Side Kick to east
In continuous motion, Right Repeat Side Kick to east

Right knee lands next to left knee, left foot steps a back-stance length to west (similar to back stance, but with rear knee on floor in line with front heel; ball of foot on floor), simultaneous Left Knifehand High Block, Right Vertical Ridgehand Strike to west, groin level
No step, Left Upset Knifehand Block to west high section
No step, Right Reverse Punch to west mid-section
No step, Left Punch to west mid-section
Jump up 1 rear stance length to west to left X-stance, Left Horizontal Double Knifehand Strike to west, mid-section
Right Spin Heel Kick to west mid or high section
Right foot lands to east in right back stance to west, Left Double Ridgehand Block, slow (2 seconds) to west high section
No step, C-Block (as if grabbing attackers stick on 45° angle) to west mid and high section
Right foot steps west 1 sparring stance length, Left Step Jump Spin Heel Kick to west mid or high section
Land in left back stance to west (right foot on west point), Right Double Ridgehand Block to west high section
No step, C-Block (as if grabbing attackers stick on 45° angle), slow (2 seconds) to mid and high section
Left pulls to shield right knee in right one-legged stance (right foot on west point), Twin Punch to west high section
Right Jump Front Kick to southwest mid or high section, left foot lands 1 sparring stance length northwest (on diagonal); right foot does not set down
No step, Left Jump Front Kick to southeast mid or high section. Right foot lands in place; left leg does not set down
No step, Right Jump Front Kick to northwest mid or high section. Left foot lands in place
Right foot lands on northeast diagonal in right rear stance, Twin Downward Palm Heel Block (wrists touching) low section
Left Jump Reverse Side Kick to northeast mid or high section. Land in left sparring stance to northeast with right foot remaining in place. KI-HAP
Right foot steps 1 sparring stance length northeast, Left Step Spin Heel Kick to northeast mid or high section, land in middle stance
Double step northeast to middle stance (right foot on north point), Twin Vertical Back Elbow Strike to rear mid-section
Left foot steps to right for closed stance to north, Twin Palm Heel Push, slow (2 seconds) to sides, shoulder level
Left steps counterclockwise to right rear stance to south (right foot on north point), Right Low Reverse Inner Forearm Block to south
No step, Left Downward Punch to south low section
No step, Right Reverse Punch to south mid-section
No step, Right Repeat Reverse Punch to south mid-section
No step, Left Punch to south high section
Left foot steps to right, right foot steps south to left back stance (left foot on north point), Right High/Low Block with tension (5 seconds) to south
Left #2 Front Kick to south low or mid-section
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick to south mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Left Hook Kick to south mid or high section
Land in left sparring stance to south, right foot steps to left, Left #3 Hook Kick to south mid or high section
In a continuous motion, Left Round Kick to south mid or high section
Land in right back stance to south (left foot on center point), Right Reverse Augmented Downward Hammerfist Strike (elbow of right arm on back of left fist) to south high section
No step, Left Augmented Downward Backfist Strike (elbow of left arm on back of right fist) to south high section
Right foot steps south to middle stance (body faces east, left foot on center point), Left Circular Double Knifehand Low Block to north
No step, Right Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block to south
No step, Left Circular Double Inner Forearm Block to north high section
No step, Right Circular Double Ridgehand Block to south high section
Bah-ro - Right foot steps to end position.
Shi-uh - At ease position

segments.technique: L Knifehand High Block / R Upset Knifehand Strike
R Downward Palm Heel Block (5 sec)
R Double Knifehand Low Block (5 sec)
L Reverse Upset First Knuckle Punch
L Reverse Horizontal First Finger Strike
L High/Low Palm Heel Block (5 sec)
L Circular Downward Double Knifehand Strike (2 sec)
L Downward Palm Heel Block (5 sec) KI-HAP
L Knifehand High Block / R Vertical Ridgehand Strike
L Step Jump Spin Heel Kick
R Low Reverse Inner Forearm Block
R Rev. Augmented Downward Hammerfist Strike
L Circular Double Knifehand Low Block
R Circular Double Outer Forearm Low Block
L Circular Double Inner Forearm Block
